content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content:
Greetings Maryam, thank you for your interest in our apartment in Duisburg. Let us focus on discussing the rental price at this moment. 

As we proceed with negotiations, please keep in mind that I'm aiming to secure the highest possible price for this 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, conveniently close to all important facilities. 

To start, I have an initial figure in mind, but I'm open to hearing your proposal as well. Once we've exchanged rental price suggestions, we can determine if we can reach an agreement or if further discussions are required. 

If at any point you're satisfied with a proposed price and we can reach an understanding, I'll respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' Should the conversation not align with my objectives, I may choose to end the negotiation with a reason explaining my decision. 

Should we reach a consensus or if our positions remain unreconciled, the negotiation process will conclude accordingly with the designated 'TERMINATE' statement. 

I look forward to exploring the rental price possibilities with you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
